mapper.insert: insert into o_teacher (no, name, department_id, gender, email, phone) values (#{teacher.no},#{teacher.name},#{teacher.department},#{teacher.gender},#{teacher.email},#{teacher.phone});
insert into t_user (username, password, roleId, available, name, staff, phone) values (#{user.username},#{user.password},#{user.roleId},#{user.available},#{user.name},#{user.staff},#{user.phone});
mapper.delete: DELETE tu,ot FROM o_teacher ot,t_user tu WHERE ot.phone = #{phone} and tu.phone = #{phone}
